patthana22.7:1.1: Nakusalaṁ nosaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.7:3.1: Nakusalaṁ noganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.7:5.1: Nakusalaṁ nooghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.7:7.1: Nakusalaṁ noyogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.7:9.1: Nakusalaṁ nonīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.7:11.1: Nakusalaṁ noparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
